error.download_or_no_zones: Download zones needs to be enabled or links to GeoJSON files need to be defined
error.invalid_path: The file could not be found
error.unreachable_url: One or more urls cannot be reached
error.zones_are_downloaded: The configuration can not be for entities that have downloaded the zone files.

data_description.download_zones: Use a local GeoJSON file to store the zones in. This will load the above defined files into a single file. The entities will only use this single file to retrieve the zones from. if no GeoJSON files are defined we will create a empty GeoJSON file.
data_description.prioritize_zone_files: If you want to prioritize the order of the zone files, enable this option. this means that if a tracker is in multiple zones it will only consider those with the lowest priority
data_description.registered_entities: Select the entities that you want to track in the zones.
data_description.zone_urls: Enter the URLs of the GeoJSON files that contain the zones you want to track. this supports both websites and files in the /config directory

data.zones_are_downloaded: The configuration can not be for entities that have downloaded the zone files.

data_description.prioritize_zone_files: If you want to prioritize the order of the zone files, enable this option. this means that if a tracker is in multiple zones it will only consider those with the lowest priority
data_description.zone_urls: Enter the URLs of the GeoJSON files that contain the zones you want to track. this supports both websites and files in the /config directory

add_new_zone.description: Add a new zone to the existing zones

zone.description: The GeoJSON representation of the new zone to add
zone.name: Zone Data

add_new_zone.name: Add Zone

delete_zone.description: Remove a zone from the system

zone_name.description: The name of the zone to delete
zone_name.name: Zone Name

delete_zone.name: Delete Zone

zone.description: The GeoJSON representation of the modified zone
zone.name: Zone Data

zone_name.description: The name of the zone to edit
zone_name.name: Zone Name

reload_zones.description: Reload the zones stored in the GeoJSON files. This will retrieve them from the stored location and update the entities internal cache of the zones.
reload_zones.name: Reload Zones

replace_all_zones.description: Replace all existing zones with new ones defined in GeoJSON format

zone.description: The GeoJSON representation of all zones to replace the existing ones
zone.name: GeoJSON Data

replace_all_zones.name: Replace All Zones
